title: Kaiko Sareta Ankoku Heishi (30-dai) no Slow na Second Life - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Adopted Protagonist   Adventurers   Beautiful Female Lead   Blacksmith   Demon Lord   Demons   Elemental Magic   Famous Parents   Jealousy   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Strong Love Interests   Sudden Strength Gain   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Underestimated Protagonist
author: Okazawa 64   Okazawa Rokujuuyon   岡沢六十四
description: The dark soldier, Dariel (30 years old), who can’t use magic despite being in the Demon Lord’s army, was fired for his lack of capacity. Having been raised by the previous Demon Lord himself, he finds that his adoptive brother, the new Demon Lord, has little use for him. However, after rescuing a villager girl from a forest monster, Dariel is invited into her village and starts realizing that he may be considerably more powerful than what he thought…>
